Sentencas: Nickel-free solid oxide fuel cell anodes are an object of study for applications that aim at utilising primary carbonaceous fuels to generate power.
Titulo: Ceria-Co-Cu-based SOFC anode for direct utilisation of methane or ethanol as fuels

Sentencas: In this study, a ceria-Co-Cu anode is produced and tested with hydrogen, methane and ethanol fuels at various temperatures.
Titulo: Ceria-Co-Cu-based SOFC anode for direct utilisation of methane or ethanol as fuels

Sentencas: The produced catalysts were characterised by X-ray analysis and H-2 temperature programmed reduction (TPR).
Titulo: Ceria-Co-Cu-based SOFC anode for direct utilisation of methane or ethanol as fuels

Sentencas: Catalytic tests were performed and compared with the material under electrochemical operation.
Titulo: Ceria-Co-Cu-based SOFC anode for direct utilisation of methane or ethanol as fuels

Sentencas: The cells were electrochemically characterised by recording i-V plots.
Titulo: Ceria-Co-Cu-based SOFC anode for direct utilisation of methane or ethanol as fuels

Sentencas: The samples were assessed post-test for eventual carbon deposits by Raman spectroscopy investigations and temperature-programmed oxidation (TPO) analysis.
Titulo: Ceria-Co-Cu-based SOFC anode for direct utilisation of methane or ethanol as fuels

Sentencas: The cells were able to operate with hydrogen, methane as well as ethanol, directly fed to the anode, with maximum power densities ranging from 400 to 540 mW.cm(-2), depending on the fuel stream utilised.
Titulo: Ceria-Co-Cu-based SOFC anode for direct utilisation of methane or ethanol as fuels

Sentencas: The cells also kept their integrity demonstrating coking resistance for over 24 h of continuous operation.
Titulo: Ceria-Co-Cu-based SOFC anode for direct utilisation of methane or ethanol as fuels

Sentencas: Important discussions and conclusions are drawn about carbon formation and the role of each compound in the anode composition.
Titulo: Ceria-Co-Cu-based SOFC anode for direct utilisation of methane or ethanol as fuels

Sentencas: The bimetallic cell (ceria-Co-Cu) is herein compared to monometallic ones (ceria-Co and ceria-Cu) that served as baselines.
Titulo: Ceria-Co-Cu-based SOFC anode for direct utilisation of methane or ethanol as fuels

Sentencas: The advantages of the bimetallic composition are listed and evaluated throughout the discussions.
Titulo: Ceria-Co-Cu-based SOFC anode for direct utilisation of methane or ethanol as fuels
